channel.title: Is there a tut for
channel.description:
I was wondering if there was a tutorial for making your finished server online, so that you can add it to the server status list.
I finished Port Forwarding, No-Ip, I even downloaded uTorrent but have no idea what it does for me really for one reason...
Everytime I run uTorrent and try to run my server, it says that my server is already in use.. Not sure why.
If anyone can help, it would be much appreciated!
Thanks, Aleksander.

item.title: Is there a tut for
item.dc:creator: @Aleksander Aleksander
item.description:
@Aleksander wrote:

Not that I can remember, I’m like 90% sure that I havn’t.

Is there any way for me to check everything that’s running off the port on my computer?

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a tut for
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Are you sure you haven’t previously used “Javaw”, or have anything else running on the port 43594?

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a tut for
item.dc:creator: @Aleksander Aleksander
item.description:
@Aleksander wrote:

Alright, I’ll try that again.

Btw, Thanks for the Tutorial![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2009, 12:39:48 am[/size][hr]public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; // 43594=default

This is what it is set to right now.

I have my No-Ip box with a check in it, which should mean that it’s running.

I don’t know if I need uTorrent or not because it seems that everytime I run it, a message on my “run.bat” pops up as “server already is use”.

Really lost with this whole thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a tut for
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Okay I’ll write up my own tutorial on this, just for you.

[size=20pt]CLICK RUN.BAT[/size]
If it says the port is already in use please change the port by going into a file called “server”, with the .java extension and searching the current port, or you could close whatever else may be running on that port.

Credits:
Telenim
Incontrol- For the idea
Aleksander - For asking for the tutorial and actually making me write it
The Soul
Stormcutter

Read full topic

…And… I still couldn’t find it and my problem has not been solved.
